title: Streamline your project management needs with Microsoft Project Professional 2021, only $20
content:
Macworld

Good project management is an art, and one that can be enhanced with productivity-enhancing tools. For effective project management for managers and team members alike, consider investing in Microsoft Project Professional 2021.

Project is Microsoft’s popular project management software (4.4-star rated by Capterra and GetApp!), offering aid for managers to predict project outcomes, synchronization with other Microsoft platforms, and more. Now, lifetime access to Project Professional 2021 is only $19.97 (reg. $249) until April 22.

Whether you’re trying to juggle a lot of tasks on your own or keep a large team on track, Microsoft Project can help with various templates to suit your needs. Take advantage of the software’s pre-built templates to begin projects correctly, and sync your work with Project Online and Project Server.

With Project, managers can map out an entire project on a timeline and move task deadlines forward or back as changes arise. Forecasting tools can help predict a plan’s success or failure, while smart invoicing tools can save time and paperwork along the way.

Enjoy access to tools that can improve project lifetime license to Microsoft Project Professional 2021 for just $19.97 through April 22 at 11:59 PM Pacific.

 

Microsoft Project Professional 2021 for Windows – $19.97

See Deal
